summary: This allows you to craft lock picks out of iron ingots at forges.
descriptionHtml:
**************************
Install
**************************

(1) Put the .esp file into your /Data/ folder in your skyrimm install location.

(2) At the skyrim launcher, click on Data Files, and make sure that craftablelockpicks.esp is checked. OR open %localappdata%\\Skyrim\\plugins.txt and add craftablelockpicks.esp to a new line.

**************************
Uninstall
**************************

Delete craftablelockpicks.esp

**************************
Other Mod(s)
**************************

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=905]Longer Candlelight Spell[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=951]Longer Khajit Night Eye[/url]
author: Hull
